endpoints.description: Retrieve real-time operational status of all monitored machinery.
Set up alerts for specific machinery condition thresholds.
Access predictive maintenance analytics and insights for machinery.
Retrieve historical sensor data for the specified machinery by its ID.
Update configuration settings for the specified machinery by its ID.
Remove an existing alert by its ID.
Upload sensor data files for processing and analysis.
Generate and download a comprehensive system health report.
Retrieve scheduled maintenance details for all monitored machinery.
Submit user feedback regarding the service and its endpoints.
